name: SVGPatternElement
description: The SVGPatternElement interface corresponds to the <pattern> element.

members.name: SVGPatternElement.patternUnits
members.description: An SVGAnimatedEnumeration corresponding to the patternUnits attribute of the given <pattern> element. Takes one of the constants defined in SVGUnitTypes.

members.name: SVGPatternElement.patternContentUnits
members.description: An SVGAnimatedEnumeration corresponding to the patternContentUnits attribute of the given <pattern> element. Takes one of the constants defined in SVGUnitTypes.

members.name: SVGPatternElement.patternTransform
members.description: An SVGAnimatedTransformList corresponding to the patternTransform attribute of the given <pattern> element.

members.name: SVGPatternElement.x
members.description: An SVGAnimatedEnumeration corresponding to the x attribute of the given <pattern> element.

members.name: SVGPatternElement.y
members.description: An SVGAnimatedEnumeration corresponding to the y attribute of the given <pattern> element.

members.name: SVGPatternElement.width
members.description: An SVGAnimatedEnumeration corresponding to the width attribute of the given <pattern> element.

members.name: SVGPatternElement.height
members.description: An SVGAnimatedEnumeration corresponding to the height attribute of the given <pattern> element.
